logic.util

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.util.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Object
    Rectangle that is defined by its top left and bottom right corners. Can be resized to fit a set of points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Rectangle in 2d space.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(Point p)
      Check if point is inside a rectangle.
      int getHeight() 
      Point getLeftTop() 
      Point getRightBottom() 
      int getWidth() 
      void resize(Set<Point> points, int padding)
      Resizes the rectangle to contain all points contained in set, with padding.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(int x1,
         int y1,
         int x2,
         int y2)
        Rectangle in 2d space.
        Parameters:
        x1 - Top left x.
        y1 - Top left y.
        x2 - Bottom right x.
        y2 - Bottom right y.

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Point p)
        Check if point is inside a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        p - Point to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the point is inside this rectangle, otherwise false.

      • resize

        public void resize(Set<Point> points,
          int padding)
        Resizes the rectangle to contain all points contained in set, with padding. If set is null or empty, nothing is done (empty set is a subset of every other set).
        Parameters:
        points - A set of all points
        padding - Amount of room around points, must be non-negative

      • getLeftTop

        public Point getLeftTop()
        Returns:
        Top left as a point.

      • getRightBottom

        public Point getRightBottom()
        Returns:
        Bottom right as a point.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
